title: Add a TitleOK WHAT IF THE WORKAROUND DOES NOT WORK
body:
Im running a g510 usb keyboard when the screen goes out of range it will not allow alt + enter to work

also setting the setting too windowed mode =2 doesn't help same issue was running fine till patch now I have a crap load of leaves

replies.body:
You may need to reset your config entirely in this case to fix it up.  Keep in mind that doing so will require you to redo your bindings:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
